Invocation Name: hoda
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to HODA, the Homeowner Digital Assistant. 
FirstService Residential created HODA to provide Residents with timely access to relevant information about their communities. 

To use HODA, you must be registered to FirstService Residential Resident Portal. Login or create an account here: https://portal.connectresident.com/. 
Once you have created an account, you can get started by saying “Alexa, open HODA”. 

To find out your balance, you can say things like “Alexa, ask HODA to provide me my balance.” 

To hear about your transactions, you can say things like “Alexa, ask HODA to give me the last charge”, “Alexa, ask HODA to tell me the last payment I have”, or “Alexa, ask HODA to get me my last 10 transactions”. 

To obtain your latest statement or request a few recent statements, you can say things like “Alexa, ask HODA to send me my latest statement”, or “Alexa, ask HODA to email me my last 5 statements”. Please note that statements can only be sent to residents who reside in the United States. This feature is currently under development. 

If you have questions about your community, you can start your request like “Alexa, tell HODA that I have a question”, “Alexa, tell HODA that I want to know”, or “Alexa, ask HODA to tell me about” and complement it with your question. You can say things like “Alexa, tell HODA that I have a question about Rental Information”, or “Alexa, ask HODA to tell me about my pool hours”, or “Alexa, tell HODA that I want to know about my rental policy”. 

If you’d like additional assistance from Customer Care, you can say things like “Alexa, ask HODA to give me an agent”, or “I need additional assistance.” 

If you’d like to be reminded capabilities HODA has, you can say “Alexa, tell HODA that I’d like to know about HODA”. 

If you own more than one residence, Alexa will ask you to select the address of the residence you’d like to know more about. The address will be saved so you can ask a few questions in a row. If you would like to change the address, you can simply say “Change the residence”.
